title: Your scorecard system sucks ass Riot
body:
I just played probably the worst game I have had in months, I get a B.

I have had better games with the same score, do you even have any idea how to manage this?

And yes, I know how Riot WANT it to work.

replies.body: Well, its not about how bad your game was. The rank is based off more than just how well you "did". I think a lot of people don't realise how much of an impact you CS has on your rank. I see so many people getting a - b scores even if they went 19/2/3 or something, simply because they got like 100 cs in a 4-minute game. and on the other side, I see people getting S ranks for going like 5/1/6 with like 220 CS in a 25-minute match.
git gud and the s ranks will flow

You post about this at least once a week XD

May I recommend asking the guy in-charge of the system? **Riot Ghostcrawler**'s pretty active on his [ask.fm](http://ask.fm/RiotGhostcrawler) especially around 3 pm (California time).
